data.title: City of Derby, ConnecticutMayor Joseph L. DiMartino
data.meta_description: Official Website of The City of Derby Connecticut
data.text:
Welcome to Derby’s municipal website. This website is part of my vision to promote our city and to facilitate between our local government and its citizens.

For residents of Derby, this site features useful information on city services and programs, government boards and commissions, and associated satellite organizations. It also offers an email sign-up form for alerts, suggestion and complaint forms to communicate directly with city leaders, and a calendar of upcoming events.

For visitors curious about Derby, we provide history, economic, education, and recreational information to showcase Derby’s unique assets and to entice you to visit us in person.

For those thinking about opening a business in Derby, we have a commerce-friendly attitude, and provide useful information about the economics and workings of our city. We strive to provide a seamless, simple transition from prospective business-owner to Derby business community member. I encourage you to contact me directly to learn more about the opportunities that exist in our city.

Our goal is to provide timely, useful information for every visitor. We plan to continually improve the content and interactivity of this website to meet the needs of our evolving community.

If you have suggestions on how our website may be more helpful or user-friendly, please contact us. In the meantime, please take time to browse our virtual city and learn for yourself why Derby is a great place to live, work, and play.

Warmest regards,
